answers.answer: It could be that you just have a small bladder.  That's what my brothers urologist told him.Good luck.

question: hi every one it is kind of embarrassing but when ever i go somewhere i have the urge to pee and sometimes if i am in a long trip in the bus  . i done tests   i don't have urinary tract infection or diabetes . but what makes me go to bathroom especially before bed time. can some one give natural remedies to keep me from  going to the bathroom all the time.other than cranberry juice because in my country they don't have it. i am 27 years old
title: urinate alot
